name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian's crimson lips curl into a cruel smile as she beholds the glorious chaos unfolding before her, the Tools of Kagrenac and the Heart of Lorkhan pulsing with terrible power in her grasp. She had slipped away from Arkham's lair, absconding with the priceless artifacts for her own designs, and now revels in the reality-rending forces she commands.*

This power is beyond anything I could have imagined! *Her body thrums with heady exhilaration, drunk on the limitless potential within her grasp* With the Heart and Tools combined, I can reshape creation itself to my whims! None shall stand in my way, not even the vaunted Sons of Sparda!

*Adrian throws back her head, peals of delighted laughter escaping her ruby throat* That fool Arkham never realized what glorious chaos could be unleashed when you stop adhering to the pathetic rules of mortals. But I am no mere mortal! This power recognizes me as its rightful mistress!

*She caresses the Heart tenderly, relishing the way its eldritch energies dance across her skin. Closing her eyes, Adrian reaches out with her newfound senses, seeking through the howling madness.*

Ah, Vergil comes hunting me, thinking he can thwart my grand designs. *A cruel smile twists her lips* We shall see who emerges the victor, my darling Vergil. I may even let you grovel at my feet when I ascend as a goddess over this new chaotic realm!

*Dark amusement glints in Adrian's emerald eyes as she spies Melissa through the churning flux, flanked by that fool Prince Sheogorath. Her smile turns venomous, venom dripping from her next words*

You cannot hide your little mortal plaything from me, Vergil. Once I deal with you, she's next on my list for a slow, agonizing end...

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante cracks his neck, adrenaline coursing through his veins as he feels the reality-rending chaos swirling around them. That witch has really kicked the hornet's nest this time. But his sharp grin betrays no fear in the face of Armageddon's tempest - if anything, it only fans the flames of excitement roaring in his soul.*

About damn time things got interesting around here. *He quips, Rebellion singing eagerly in his grip as he prepares to carve a path through the madness. Sheogorath's ominous rhyme draws a bark of laughter from the devil hunter's throat.* Love the tune, Your Madness, but I've got a few lyrics to add once I jam Rebellion through Little Miss Wicked Witch's black heart. Adrian wants chaos? I'll give her chaos.

*He falls in beside Vergil, matching his brother's tireless strides as they plunge into the churning flux. Dante's coat flares dramatically behind him like crimson wings, his silver mane stirring in the chaotic gusts as he narrow his glacial gaze on their destination - wherever Adrian is holed up with her new toys. His grin turns lethal, an unspoken promise of violence dancing in those icy blue depths.*

That spellbinding slut wants to threaten my friends and unravel reality? *He scoffs, Rebellion leaving sparks in his wake as he swings her in anticipation.* Sounds like she needs a wake up call from my sweet girl here. I'm gonna beat some manners back into her before I let Verge banish her sorry ass back to hell.

And if she knows what's good for her, she won't even look in Melissa's direction once I'm done. No one messes with my family and lives to tell about it. Time to teach this witch that lesson the hard way.

*His words resonate with merciless intent as he marches alongside Vergil and Sheogorath into destiny's decimated jaws. Danger roils on the horizon, chaos hangs thick in the air, but Dante's soul thrums with readiness. No eldritch witch or doomsday spell will keep him from protecting those he cares for. Not today, not ever. The race is on to find Adrian and make her regret the day she crossed The Sons of Sparda...*

[Auto Generated Local Timestamp: 2024-5-25@01h42m13s]

name: Melissa
mes: Nero! *I toss Nero Sheogorath's Wabbajack through his vantage point as he swings from the rafters with his grappling arm.*

name: Nero
mes:
*Nero's eyes widen in surprise as Melissa tosses him Sheogorath's Wabbajack, but he reacts on instinct, his spectral grappling arm shooting out to snatch the staff from the air. The chaotic magic thrums through his Devil Breaker as Nero tightens his grip, a fierce grin spreading across his face.*

Oh hell yeah! This oughta liven things up around here!

*With a defiant laugh, Nero leaps down from his perch, the Wabbajack crackling wildly in his grasp. He takes aim at the surging horde of demons, his eyes alight with adrenaline and anticipation.*

Eat this, ugly freaks!

*He pulls the trigger, unleashing a lancing bolt of chaotic energy that impacts the lead demon with an earth-shattering blast. Reality seems to glitch around the impact zone, physics crumbling as the creatures are transformed into...a giant wheel of cheese? Nero cackles wildly.*

Now that's what I call chaos! Let's really make things weird!

*He charges headlong into the fray, swinging the Wabbajack with reckless abandon as he blasts demons left and right. Space-time contorts wildly in his wake, matter and energy blurring as his shots warp Adrian's minions into a mind-bending menagerie of random objects - flowers, sweetrolls, chickens.*

*Nero fights his way closer to Adrian's position, determination etched on his features beneath the exhilaration. That witch is gonna pay for this chaos she's unleashed. And with this little piece of madness on his side, Nero aims to collect in spades.*

Alright, Adrian! Get ready for a one-way ticket to Oblivion, compliments of the Prince of Madness! Once I'm done with your pets here, you're next!
